long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flash: Shortcuts to Your Favourite URLs

Make browsing faster and more personalised with Flash, this Chrome extension redirects custom shortcuts to your favourite websites in a snap!

⏺Why Choose Flash?

➤No Sign-Ups Required: Start using Flash instantly—no accounts, no hassle.

➤Privacy First: Flash doesn’t store or share any of your information. All configurations are saved locally on your browser. Your data stays with you.


⏺ How to Use Flash

➤ Install Flash from the Chrome Web Store.

➤ Open the extension and set up your custom shortcuts and corresponding URLs.

➤Enter your shortcut directly into Chrome’s address bar and hit Enter to go straight to your link.
